summary: This adds a new cool weapon called \"Horned Greatsword\" into Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This is my new weapon mod called Horned Greatsword, It is lore-friendly, It\'s nice and deadly.

1.1v - better model

video:
WARNING: This is video where the old version of this mod was used.

[youtube]53RY0wVPD8Y[/youtube]

Sword can be found at Bleakwind Basin :

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27343-1-1353741141.jpg[/img]

It can be found by the chest :


[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27343-1-1353777504.jpg[/img]


I called it horned because of it\'s horns on the hilt :


[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27343-3-1353777429.jpg[/img]

And here are some other pictures :

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27343-1-1353777429.jpg[/img]
